name: TILP2
summary: Texas Instruments handheld(s) to computer communication program
description:
TILP2 is a communication program between Texas Instruments handhelds and computers. It is able to use any supported type of link cable (Gray/Black/Silver/Direct Link) with any TI graphing calculator.

With TiLP, you can transfer files from your PC to your Texas Instruments graphing calculator, and vice-versa. You can also make a screen dump, send/receive data, backup/restore contents, install FLASH applications, or upgrade the OS.
